item.title: AI Automation for Restaurants
item.description:
How Does It Work?

Our AI-powered automation works in three simple steps:

  1. Upload your menu - Place your weekly menu in a Google Drive Excel file
  2. Automatic processing - Our system automatically reads the data every day
  3. Posting - The menu appears on your Facebook page with professional formatting

Why Choose Automation?

Save Time

No more daily posting. The system automatically works for you every day.

Growth

Regular posting increases customer engagement and reach.
